TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DragEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 、 或 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , or event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户通过将对象拖到控件，然后将它拖到控件放释放鼠标按钮来完成拖放操作时发生事件。The event occurs when the user completes a drag-and-drop operation by dragging an object over the control and then dropping it onto the control by releasing the mouse button. 当用户移动鼠标指针拖动到控件上的拖动鼠标的对象时，将发生事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer onto the control while dragging an object with the mouse. 当用户移动鼠标指针在控件上拖动鼠标的对象时，将发生事件。The event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over the control while dragging an object with the mouse. A对象指定与此事件关联的任何数据; SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 键的当前状态和鼠标指针; 的位置和拖放效果所允许的源和目标的拖动事件。A object specifies any data associated with this event; the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys; the location of the mouse pointer; and the drag-and-drop effects allowed by the source and target of the drag event. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)] 下面的示例演示如何在源和目标的拖放操作之间传递。The following example illustrates how are passed between the source and target of a drag-and-drop operation. 在此示例中，控件是数据，源和控件是目标。In this example, a control is the source of the data, and the control is the target. 该示例假定控件填充有效的文件名的列表。The example assumes that the control has been populated with a list of valid filenames. 当用户拖动一个从显示的文件名控件拖动到打开控件，在文件名中引用的文件。When the user drags one of the displayed filenames from the control onto the control, the file referenced in the filename is opened. 在启动此操作控件的 MouseDown 事件。The operation is initiated in the control's MouseDown event. 在事件处理程序，该示例使用方法以验证该数据会在一种格式，控件可以显示，然后将设置属性以指定数据应从源代码管理复制向目标控件。In the event handler, the example uses the method to verify that the data is in a format that the control can display and then sets the property to specify that data should be copied from the source control to the target control. 最后，控件的拖放事件处理程序使用方法来检索文件名以打开。Finally, the control's DragDrop event handler uses the method to retrieve the filename to open. [!code-cpp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects AllowedEffect { get; }

summary.span: 获取拖动事件的发起方（或源）所允许的拖放操作。

span.span: Gets which drag-and-drop operations are allowed by the originator (or source) of the drag event.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件通过调用启动拖放操作的时方法，它指定可允许该操作的效果。When a control initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the method, it specifies the permissible effects of the operation. 例如，当您将文件从一个源，如果该文件是只读的 （或者从只读存储媒体如 CD），源将指示可以复制，但不是传输到目标文件。For example, when you drag a file from a source, if the file is read-only (or from a read-only storage medium such as a CD), the source will indicate that the file can be copied, but not transferred, to the target. 然后再尝试对拖动的数据执行操作，你应该检查此属性以确保允许此操作。Before attempting to perform an operation on the dragged data, you should examine this property to ensure that the operation is allowed. ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. The data associated with this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事件处理程序的正文中，你可以使用方法来确定数据是否满足将数据拖动到其上的控件的格式要求。In the body of your event handler, you can use the method to determine whether the data matches the format requirements of the control onto which the data is being dragged. 此外可以指定你是否想要尝试转换数据以满足你的格式要求。You also can specify whether you want to attempt to convert the data to meet your format requirements. 如果拖动的数据满足格式要求，使用方法来检索数据。If the dragged data meets your format requirements, use the method to retrieve the data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置拖放操作中目标放置效果。

span.span: Gets or sets the target drop effect in a drag-and-drop operation.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，应用的影响确定拖放操作的目标的鼠标光标。By default, the effect applied determines the mouse cursor for the target of a drag-and-drop operation. 这可用于向上将发生的操作的用户提供反馈。This is useful to provide feedback to the user on the operation that will occur. 例如，如果将文件拖动到来源时，按 CTRL 键，则指定以指示目标将尝试执行复制操作。For example, if you press the CTRL key when you drag a file from a source, specify to indicate the target will try to perform a copy operation. 若要使用自定义光标进行拖动操作，请参阅。To use custom cursors for a drag operation, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int KeyState { get; }
.property instance int32 KeyState
Public ReadOnly Property KeyState As Integer
public: property int KeyState { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取 Shift、Ctrl 和 Alt 键的当前状态以及鼠标按钮的状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons.

value.span: Shift、Ctrl、Alt 键以及鼠标按钮的当前状态。

span.span: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys and of the mouse buttons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以依赖于特定密钥的状态的拖放操作的效果。You can make the effect of a drag-and-drop operation to depend on the state of a particular key. 例如，你可能决定要复制或移动数据，具体取决于是否在拖放操作期间按住 CTRL 或 SHIFT 键。For example, you may decide to copy or move data depending on whether the CTRL or SHIFT keys are pressed during the drag-and-drop operation. 在中设置的位属性标识的密钥在操作期间已按下鼠标按钮。The bits that are set in the property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation. 例如，如果按鼠标左键，第一位属性设置。For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the property is set. 按位 AND 运算符可用于测试给定键的状态。You can use the bitwise AND operator to test for a given key state. 下表列出为指定的事件使用的值。The following table lists the values that are used for a specified event. |“值”Value|键Key| |-----------|---------| |1 （位 0）1 (bit 0)|鼠标左按钮。The left mouse button.| |2 （位 1）2 (bit 1)|鼠标右按钮。The right mouse button.| |4 （位 2）4 (bit 2)|Shift 键。The SHIFT key.| |8 （3 位）8 (bit 3)|CTRL 键。The CTRL key.| |16 （4 位）16 (bit 4)|鼠标中键。The middle mouse button.| |32 （位 5）32 (bit 5)|Alt 键。The ALT key.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int X { get; }
.property instance int32 X
Public ReadOnly Property X As Integer
public: property int X { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取鼠标指针在屏幕坐标系中的 x 坐标。

span.span: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse pointer, in screen coordinates.

value.span: 鼠标指针的 X 坐标（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse pointer in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个之间拖放操作控件。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 该示例通过调用方法的拖放操作启动时。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果鼠标已移动的拖放操作启动多个从期间的鼠标位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用于确定要在将拖动的项的索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 该示例还演示如何使用自定义光标拖放操作。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 该示例假定两个光标文件`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 存在于应用程序目录，用于自定义拖动和非放置光标，分别。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果将使用自定义光标`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已选中。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自定义光标设置事件处理程序。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 键盘状态评估中事件处理程序右侧`ListBox`，以确定将哪些拖动操作根据 SHIFT、 CTRL、 alt 键或 CTRL + ALT 键的状态。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期间还确定将发生放置`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要删除的数据不是`String`，则设置为。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最后，下拉的状态将显示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 要为权限放置的数据`ListBox`中确定事件处理程序和`String`值添加中的适当位置`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖动操作超出边界的窗体中，则采用取消拖放操作事件处理程序。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此代码片段演示如何使用类。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 请参阅完整的代码示例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]
